user.title: Configure Omada Controller
user.description:
Enter the TP-Link Omada Controller settings.

Notes:
* **[%key:common::config_flow::data::name%]**: Random name to identify your controller
* **[%key:common::config_flow::data::host%]**: Full URL (ie. https://my_omada.local)

data.name: Omada name (just to identify your controller)
data.dns_resolve: Try to resolve client IPs to get nicer device names
